I am currently available for hire.

Rates

$65 per hour. Non-Negotiable. All time needs to be booked ahead of time. I will require half down up front, with a minimum of 4 hours ($260) commitment.

Availability

Limited to 20 hours a week. More hours may be possible upon request.

Legal

I prefer not to sign NDAs. If this is a requirement for you, there is a $500 fee to sign your NDA. Business is also about trust, if you don't trust me I'm not sure we should work together.

To schedule work or for additional details.
